name: Phantom (itch) (sian fan)
description:
Phantom by Sian Fan 

Instructions:

Use Chrome or Firefox only - Phantom does not work on Safari.

Click fullscreen button / Click player to hide mouse / Click esc to show mouse 

Controls:

Arrow keys to move / Mouse to look / 'C' key to crouch / Space bar to jump

Credits:

Created by Sian Fan

Motion capture by Limbo Tech

Audio by Ben Dixon

Commissioned by Site Gallery
